alert.note: Alert for Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 01 at 4:51PM CDT until October 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SHERMAN AND NORTHWESTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Cactus, or 16 miles south of Stratford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Cactus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
